bibl.note: This is a letter from Rachael Greer to her son Isaac B. Williams, dated March 5, 1838. Rachael writes that Isaac's father is willing to help him acquire some land as an investment. She adds that all in the family are well.

div.p: We are all in Common health at presant present and hope this will find you well also times are flourishing in this Country the land office is Closed at presant but will be oppend opened again shortly, there is a good ade of vacant land yet, and Mr Greer says if you will send him the Silver he will enter one or more quarter Sections of Land at 50 cents per acre that be sold for $2.50 or $3.00 which would be a large profitable investment these hard times your relations are all in Common health you must Come down this Spring and us. nothing more at presant

closer.salute: but remain your affectionate Mother untill until death
